> "Any signatue in the area?"said Hydras coldly

Fractyl glanced at Iguanus and then walked over to one of the control
panels that were on the wall. He quickly called up a few displays as
the valley mine appeared on the screen. It was the city as shown from
a distance, obviously some sort of long range snap shot of it. The
pitucture showed the drab colored buildings, the haze of pollution
that seemed to settle over the city like some sort of sickening brown
and black fog.

"I am not picking up readings of anyone in the same room with it."
Fractyl said distractedly as he continued to look, "but since more
than a few of them posses the same signature masking technology as we
do, they could be just hiding their signatures from us." Fractyl
shrugged as he continued, "The signature is coming from some sort of
warehouse, so I would think that there would be some sort of defenses
online as the valley mine is not the safest place to be."

Iguanus nodded, "Yep. That's what I'd do, mask your signature, cover
the place so you can't tell who's who or even where."

Inferno stood next to Hydras as he also looked at the readouts, "If
that spark is what you want lord sire" Inferno said, "Then with you at
the lead NOTHING can stand in our way!"

Fractyl just glanced back at Hydras, waiting for his next command.

(TAG)

Preston
